markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Green Wyrmling Breath Potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=911)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Beginner Box: Game Master's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=63) pg. 53</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This liquid contains blood from a wyrmling [green dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=167). For 1 hour after you drink it, you can unleash a cloud of poison as a breath weapon. Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. The breath weapon deals 2d6 poison damage in a 15-foot cone, and each creature in the area must attempt a DC 23 basic Fortitude save. After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for 1d4 rounds.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Green Wyrmling Breath Potion
